comments.body:
Do you mind updating the documentation too, that the module doesn't fail if requester_pays is False and isn't implemented:
https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/1f73eb63c42470b8356658750c85088765bcfca1/lib/ansible/modules/cloud/amazon/s3_bucket.py#L105-L108

The root cause: since requester_pays defaults to `False` it can never be `None`.
Just stumbled over that as well.
Thanks the comment, I updated the module doc and push it again.
